metadata.title: CVE-2022-31002 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description: Sofia-SIP is an open-source Session Initiation Protocol (SIP) User-Agent library. Prior to version 1.13.8, an attacker can send a message with evil sdp to FreeSWITCH, which may cause a crash. This type of crash may be caused by a URL ending with `%`. Version 1.13.8 contains a patch for this issue.

criterions.comment: sofia-sip package in impish is affected and needs fixing.
